001/**  This controller provides functionality for the manager page after login
002 * @author Isha Virk
003 */
004package src.controller;
005
006import javafx.fxml.FXML;
007import javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent;
008import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
009
010/**
011 * This class provides functionality for the manager page after login
012 */
013public class manager_view_controller {
014
015    /**
016     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the menu items page 
017     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
018     */
019    @FXML
020    private void handle_menu_items_click(MouseEvent event)  {
021        useful_functions.switch_scene("GUI/menu_items_page.fxml", event);
022    }
023
024    /**
025     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the inventory page 
026     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
027     */
028    @FXML
029    private void handle_inventory_click(MouseEvent event) {
030        useful_functions.switch_scene("GUI/inventory_page.fxml", event);
031    }
032
033    /**
034     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the sales page
035     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
036     */
037    @FXML
038    private void handle_sales_click(MouseEvent event) {
039        useful_functions.switch_scene("GUI/sales_page.fxml", event);
040    }
041
042    /**
043     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the order page
044     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
045     */
046    @FXML
047    private void handle_take_order(ActionEvent event) {
048        useful_functions.switch_scene("GUI/order_page.fxml", event);
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the employee page
053     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
054     */
055    @FXML
056    private void handle_employee_data(ActionEvent event) {
057        useful_functions.switch_scene("GUI/employee_data.fxml", event);
058    }
059
060}
